A flowing floral maxi dress embodies the spirit of boho chic, with its free-spirited silhouette and vibrant patterns.

settings.heading: Wow! Impressed
settings.description: I absolutely love the fashion choices on this website. The quality and variety of clothing are top-notch. It's become my go-to place for trendy outfits.

settings.heading: I love this product.
settings.description: Great website for stylish clothing. I've found some fantastic pieces here. The only thing I'd suggest is more size options for a wider range of customers.

settings.heading: Highly recommended!
settings.description: This website has transformed my wardrobe! I can always count on them for the latest fashion trends. The service is excellent, and the delivery is fast.

settings.heading: Fast delivery.
settings.description: Absolutely in love with my recent fashion haul! The quality of the clothes exceeded my expectations. Will definitely be a repeat customer!

settings.heading: Dress fits perfectly.
settings.description: I love it so much! The outfits fit perfectly, and the fabrics are so comfortable. Can't wait to show off my new looks. Highly recommend this brand.

settings.heading: Fantastic choices!
settings.description: Impressed with the fashion quality and unique designs. The pieces I ordered arrived promptly. A great online shopping experience overall!

settings.heading: Impressed with it!
settings.description: Fantastic fashion choices! The clothing is not only stylish but also comfortable. Quick shipping adds to the positive experience. Will shop here again!

settings.collapse_content:
Style No. 78133949; Color Code: 066

Just as versatile as it is vintage-inspired, this so special sweater dress is featured in a long sleeve, sweater-inspired design with zip-front, collared neckline for added dimension.

Fit: Bodycon fit
Features: Long sleeve style, zip-front neckline, ribbed and cable knit detailing throughout
Why We Love It: The definition of an effortless essential, this timeless mini dress is sure to be your go-to pick all season long.

Care/Import

Hand Wash Cold

Import

Measurements for size small

  • Bust: 27.5 in
  • Length: 31.5 in
  • Sleeve Length: 25 in

Shipping:

  • Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days.
  • Expedited shipping delivers within 1-2 business days after order processing.

Returns:

Please review our Return policy for merchandise exchanges and refunds.
